select sum(bpd.ord_qty * bpd.unit_price) as totalMoney, count(*) as orderCount, so.name AS officeName, so.id AS officeId from biz_po_header bph left join biz_po_detail bpd on bpd.order_id = bph.id left join sys_office so on so.id = bph.vend_id where bph.create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and so.name is not null and bph.status = 1 and bpd.status = 1 and so.status = 1 and bph.is_prew = 0
and so.name LIKE concat('%',#{vendName},'%')
group by bph.vend_id
